casebody.data:
Jeanette HARDING, and husband James Clark Harding, Plaintiffs
v.
LOWE'S FOOD STORES, INC., and Etc Linville, LLC, Defendants. No. 150P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Steve Warren, Asheville, for Hardings. W.O. Brazil, III, Asheville, Frank J. Contrivo, Jr., for ETC Linville, LLC. Richard A. Coughlin, James R. Faucher, Greensboro, for Lowe's Food Stores, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd day of March 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2006."
